name: Call of Duty Game Data File
summary: An IWD file is a game data file used by various Activision games, namely Call of Duty 2 (CoD2) and Call of Duty 4 (CoD4). It may store various data, such as graphics, weapons, items, scripts, or other information referenced during gameplay. IWD files are included with the Call of Duty game installation and compressed with Zip compression to save disk space.
